雦字的基本解释

雦
chóu
古同“集”。

雦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》秦入切，入緝，從。］
“亼1”的今字。“雥1”的今字。“雦1”的今字。
(1)鸟栖止于树。
(2)栖身；停留。
(3)降；坠落。
(4)集合；聚集。
(5)积聚滞留。
(6)宴集；宴会。
(7)定期聚会交易。
(8)指定期聚会交易之所。
(9)集镇；市镇。
(10)汇辑单篇（幅）作品或多人有关作品而成的书册的通称。
(11)我国古代图书四部分类法的第四部类名。
(12)指某些大部头书或较长影视片中的部分和段落。
(13)至，到。
(14)遭遇；遭受。
(15)召，招致。
(16)取。
(17)辑睦；安定。
(18)成就；完成。
(19)齐一，一致。
(20)犹杂，参杂。
(21)众多。
(22)“集合”的简称。参见“集合”。
(23)姓。汉有外黄令集一。见《容斋五笔》卷一引汉应劭《风俗通》。

雦字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【隹字部】　雦； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1371第11
【字彙補】古文集字。見雲臺?。註詳四畫。

雦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
雦字的起名意思

古同“集”。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
chóu
The ancient same "collection".
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jí］
["Guang Yun" Qin cuts into the cut, into the arrest, from. ]
The present character of "亼1". The present character of "雥1". The present character of "雦1".
(1) Birds end up in trees.
(2) Shelter; stay.
(3) Falling; falling.
(4) Collection; gathering.
(5) Accumulation and detention.
(6) Banquet; Banquet.
(7) Regular gatherings and transactions.
(8) Designated meeting place for trading.
(9) Market town; municipality.
(10) A general term for a collection of a single (page) work or a collection of related works by multiple people.
(11) The fourth category name of the four-part category of ancient Chinese books.
(12) Refers to the parts and paragraphs of certain large books or longer movies.
(13) To, to.
(14) Encounter; suffer.
(15) Call, incur.
(16) Take.
(17) Ji Mu; Stability.
(18) Achievement; completion.
(19) Uniformity, unanimity.
(20) Still mixed, mixed.
(21) Numerous.
(22) Abbreviation for "collection". See "collection".
(23) Last name. There is a collection of foreign Huang Ling in the Han Dynasty. See "Fun Su Tong" by Han Ying Shao in Volume 1 of "Rong Zhai Wu Bi".
Qi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【隹字部】　雦; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1371 No. 11
【Word Supplement】A collection of ancient Chinese characters. See Yuntai?. Note the four paintings in detail.
